"Apprentice Form":
"In Apprentice Form, by commanding the drones responsible for attack and disruption, you can change your strategy on the fly.

Apprentice Form has high mobility and attack speed, but its true power comes from working together with its drones."

"This section explains the Apprentice Form skills \"Royal Scorpion\" and \"Servant Hornet\".

\"Royal Scorpion\" attacks enemies automatically for a set time after activation. As it homes in on enemies, it's an effective move to use against enemies that are difficult to hit.

\"Servant Hornet\" deploys a Photon field covering the area around you. During activation, enemies are attracted and drawn into the field."

"This explains the Apprentice Form skill \"Allure Symphony\".

When you learn Allure Symphony, a gauge is added to the top of the Weapon Palette. The gauge fills as you hit enemies with attacks and skills.

When the gauge fills, attack power and PP recovery are automatically increased. In addition, a chase attack by your drones is added to each of your PAs."
